cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I help plants grow.
🔥 I am very, very hot.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 Plants and animals live here.
💧 Most of me is covered in water.
🗺️ I am one of eight planets.

cosmos.question: I am in the sky at night. Sometimes I am round, sometimes I am just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 People say I am made of cheese.
🌝 I reflect the sun's light.

cosmos.question: I am a bright point of light in the night sky, but I am very far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle.
🌠 Sometimes you can make a wish on me.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky, and known as the Red Planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me one day.
🏜️ I have rusty dust on my surface.
🤖 Rovers explore my surface.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me, made of ice and rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I am a very big planet.
💍 My rings are very shiny.
💨 I am a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us are named after animals.
📜 Ancient people told stories about me.
📍 You can use us to find your way at night.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that flies through space and sometimes has a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am sometimes called a 'dirty snowball'.
☀️ I get brighter as I get closer to the sun.
💨 My tail always points away from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of billions of stars, gas, and dust, all held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
✨ The Sun is part of one.
🥛 Our one is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a space rock that enters Earth’s atmosphere and burns up, creating a streak of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am also known as a 'shooting star'.
🌠 If I don't burn up completely I can hit the ground.
☄️ I am usually small.

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. I can be big or small and take you to school! What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I often have lots of seats inside.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
👧 You ride me with your friends to school.

transport.question: I float on the water, but I'm not a duck. I can take you across a lake! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
🚣 People use oars to make me go.
🛶 I am smaller than a ship.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you have to pedal to make me move. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You use your legs to make it go.
🛑 You need to wear a helmet.
🚴 You can ride me on a path.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry lots of people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🛤️ I travel on metal rails.
📣 I often have a loud whistle.
🚇 I can travel underground too.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people on long journeys. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I travel through the clouds.
✈️ I have wings.
🌍 I can take you to a different country.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people who are sick or hurt. I have a siren!

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud 'wee woo' sound.
🚑 I have a red cross on me.
👩‍⚕️ I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I am big and carry lots of things on the road. I help deliver packages to your house!

hints.text: 📦 I am used for transportation of goods.
🚚 I have many wheels.
🛑 I sometimes have a trailer.

transport.question: I have a motor, but I'm not a car. I have two wheels and you wear a helmet. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am faster than a bicycle.
🏍️ I can be loud.
🛣️ I am often seen on highways.

transport.question: I can fly straight up, but I'm not an airplane. I have spinning blades on top.

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
⚕️ Sometimes I am used to rescue people from mountains.
⬆️ I take off and land vertically.

transport.question: I travel to space, far beyond Earth. I can carry astronauts to the moon!

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👩‍🚀 I need a lot of fuel to launch.
🌌 I explore the universe.
